title: Music keeps playing in pixel 3 when I am getting call in vibrate mode? How to fix it?
content: I am having some problem; While I am playing music be it amazon prime or youtube, when I get calls in vibrate mode the music won't pause. I receive call and vibrate for call due to which I don't even know I had missed calls. Why is that happening? My device is Pixel 3. My wife has Pixel 4 but same problem. Looks like unwanted feature. How to fix it?
